Lab 1. Qt basicsÂ¶

This chapter will guide you through corner stones of C++ based application development using Qt. We will start with overview of typical main.cpp file for Qt project, then proceed with contents of C++ based Qt basic modules, such as QtCore, QtGui, and QtWidgets. Later on we will look at signal slot philosophy, which is the corner stone of Qt.

  • Qt basic modules
  • Signal slot phylosophy
